__e: "1: on the retirement of the present Commander U.S. Naval Forces at this date,
Now that Al's retired, we'll have so much time together.
Use father's retirement bonus as collateral...
This mediocrity? This waiting to be wrapped away in mothballs of a pension?
You couldn’t be blamed for thinking that either they must really love their kids or they are expecting a fairly decent retirement present from their little treasure.
Then I have a retirement account that's about four thousand.
We're sending them into retirement, and perhaps we're not considering that, one day, we have to go also.
You'll carry on on the lines I laid down, or I'll come out of retirement and do the job myself.
